text: Does anyone have a R for Julia programmers guide or have some intro they recommend?

elements.text: Does anyone have a R for Julia programmers guide or have some intro they recommend?

text: Its actually pretty similar to Julia, though I don't know of the guide. Like most people I went the other way. This is probably one of the best resources: <https://r4ds.had.co.nz/>.
